ecksdee.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecksdee.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a shape on a coordinate plane
    Version:
    10-3-17
    Author:
    Johnry

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x
      the first x and y coordinates of the shape
      protected double y
      the first x and y coordinates of the shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double x, double y)
      makes a shape object at (x,y) and makes all colors black and strokeWeight of 6
      Shape(double x, double y, java.awt.Color stroke, java.awt.Color fill, int width)
      makes a very customized shape

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             java.awt.Color stroke,
             java.awt.Color fill,
             int width)
        makes a very customized shape
        Parameters:
        x - x coord of the shape
        y - y coord of the shape
        stroke - stroke color of type java.awt.Color
        fill - fill color of type java.awt.Color
        width - strokeWeight of the object

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        makes a shape object at (x,y) and makes all colors black and strokeWeight of 6
        Parameters:

        y - y coord of obj

        checks if a point is inside a shape
        Parameters:

        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if inside, false if not

        public void move(double x,
                 double y)
        moves objects by x units right and y units down
        Parameters:

        y - type of double , moves down by this many pixels

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        draws shape with strokecolor, fillcolor, and stroke width preset.
        Parameters:
        drawer - pass in a PApplet with processing core
        Postcondition:
        the drawer's strokeWeight, fill, and stroke will be changed.
